availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, carpenter. Native of Germany. Married to Sophia Swire. Father of Anthony Swire. Carpenter in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Carpenter in Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Carpenter in Covington in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Fulton, p. 241A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 840.
Williams' Covington Directory for 1861 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1861), 444.
